scripts.build:dev: NEXT_PUBLIC_ENV=dev rm -rf out && next build && rm -rf apps/dev && mkdir -p apps/dev && cp -R out/* apps/dev/
scripts.build:prod: NEXT_PUBLIC_ENV=prod rm -rf out && next build && rm -rf public/app && mkdir -p public/app && cp -R out/* public/app/
scripts.rebuild:dev: pnpm run clean && pnpm run build:dev
scripts.rebuild:prod: pnpm run clean && pnpm run build:prod
scripts.deploy:dev: pnpm run build:dev && firebase deploy --only hosting:relivemarket-dev
scripts.deploy:prod: pnpm run build:prod && firebase deploy --only hosting:relivemarket
